Data Deletion Policy

Transparency and control over your personal data.

Introduction

SingForUs is a platform dedicated to empowering voices through community, audio engagement, and shared experiences. We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This policy outlines how you can request the deletion of your data from our systems.

Data We Collect

  • Basic Account Information: Name, username, and profile picture.
  • Contact Information: Email address.
  • Usage Data: App interaction logs, preferences, and settings.
  • User Content: Audio recordings, comments, and other media uploads.

Why We Collect This Data

We collect this data to provide, maintain, and improve the SingForUs experience. It allows us to personalize your profile, facilitate community interactions, and ensure the security of our platform.

How to Request Data Deletion

If you wish to delete your account and all associated data, you can do so by contacting our support team. Please send an email with the subject line "Data Deletion Request" to:

support@singforus.co

*Please send the request from the email address associated with your SingForUs account so we can verify your identity.

Our Deletion Process

  1. We verify your identity to ensure the request is legitimate.
  2. We initiate the deletion process for your account and associated personal data from our active databases.
  3. We remove your public content (e.g., comments, posts) from the platform.
  4. We send you a final confirmation email once the process is complete.

Deletion Timeline

Once your request is verified, the data deletion process is typically completed within 7 to 30 days. Please note that some data may be retained in our backups for a limited period as required by law or for disaster recovery purposes, after which it will be permanently deleted.

Permanent Deletion

Warning: Data deletion is permanent and cannot be undone. Once your account is deleted, you will lose access to your profile, history, and any content you have created on SingForUs.

Compliance & Privacy

This policy is designed to comply with global data privacy regulations, including GDPR and Google Play Store data safety requirements. We are committed to ensuring your rights to data privacy and control are respected.
